metadata.title: CVE-2020-18442 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: Infinite Loop in zziplib v0.13.69 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via the return value "zzip_file_read" in the function "unzzip_cat_file".

criterions.comment: zziplib package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
